TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sowal_no_dipong, title = Sowal_no_dipong, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sowal_no_dipong} }

S.FORM: Itiya 2002 a mihecaan, misatapangkoTaypak Sisifo yincomincosewuiingkay, Oco-wey ci KonWen Ci ko misalaheciaya patireng to sowal no dipong. Tangasa imatini, tolo polo' ira ko tosa ko polong no picodadan ato pasifana'ay to sowal no kasasiromaromaa finacadan i tokay. Hatinikaadihay ko sowal no dipong. O no Pangcah i, ira kono 'Amis, o Siwkulang, o Pasawaliay, Falangaw ato Palidaw a sowal.

Itiya 2002 a mihecaan, misatapangkoTaypak Sisifo yincomincosewoiingkay, Oco-wey ci KonWen Ci ko misalaheciaya patireng to sowal no dipong. Tangasa imatini, tolo polo' ira ko tosa ko polong no picodadan ato pasifana'ay to sowal no kasasiromaromaa finacadan i tokay. Hatinikaadihay ko sowal no dipong. O no Pangcah i, ira kono 'Amis, o Siwkolang, o Pasawaliay, Falangaw ato Palidaw a sowal.
